```{r}

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
mtcars %>% 
  group_by(cyl) %>% 
  summarize(across(c(mpg, wt), c(mean = ~ sprintf("%.1f", mean(.)), 
                                 sd = ~ sprintf("(%.2f)", sd(.))))) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
